name: Synari
appearance: Tall, bioluminescent beings with crystalline head crests.
lore_tag: Masters of knowledge, obsessed with understanding the universe.

name: Vektril
appearance: Pill bug-like exoskeletal hive beings with iridescent shells.
lore_tag: Hive-minded industrialists with endless labor capacity.

name: Ursoids
appearance: Massive rhino-like humanoids with plated hides.
lore_tag: Proud warriors who dominate in ground combat.

name: Zherin
appearance: Serpentine reptilians with layered scales and hypnotic eyes.

name: Felyari
appearance: Canid predators with sharp fangs and hunterâ€™s instincts.
lore_tag: Fearless fleet hunters, excelling in ambushes.

name: Avarii
appearance: Graceful butterfly-winged humanoids with delicate frames.
lore_tag: Natural pilots with unmatched maneuvering skill.

name: Lithari
lore_tag: Stone-born beings, able to thrive anywhere but slow to expand.

name: Umbrans
lore_tag: Masters of secrecy, feared spies and saboteurs.

name: Concordians
appearance: Adaptable humanoids with diverse features and unifying symbols.
lore_tag: Traders and diplomats who thrive on unity.

name: Seraphid
appearance: Elegant, butterfly-winged mystics with psychic eyes.
lore_tag: Psychic manipulators, feared in diplomacy and espionage.

name: Pelagians
lore_tag: Aquatic wanderers, swift in space but slow to expand.
